Package ohos.sensor.bean

Class CategoryMotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sensor.bean.SensorBase
      • ohos.sensor.bean.CategoryMotion

  • public final class CategoryMotion
extends SensorBase
    Inherits from SensorBase and describes motion sensors on hardware devices.

    This class describes the sensor types in the motion category, such as the acceleration, gravity, and gyroscope sensors. It also provides the method for constructing a CategoryMotion instance.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    SensorBase
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Sensors#SENSOR

      • SENSOR_TYPE_ACCELEROMETER

        public static final int SENSOR_TYPE_ACCELEROMETER
        An integer representing the linear acceleration sensor type.

        Before subscribing to this sensor, the application needs to request the ohos.permission.ACCELEROMETER permission.

        Since:

      • SENSOR_TYPE_PEDOMETER

        public static final int SENSOR_TYPE_PEDOMETER
        An integer representing the pedometer sensor type.

        Pedometer sensors are generally used by health applications to record the number of steps a user has walked. If the system is restarted, the step count is reset to 0. When the system is started, the pedometer sensor starts working and logging the user's steps. Before subscribing to such a sensor, the application needs to request the ohos.permission.ACTIVITY_MOTION permission. Upon subscription, the application will obtain the latest step count. If the application unsubscribes from the sensor, the step count data on the application will not be refreshed.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SENSOR_TYPE_PEDOMETER_DETECTION

        public static final int SENSOR_TYPE_PEDOMETER_DETECTION
        An integer representing the pedometer detection sensor type.

        The pedometer detection sensor is used to detect whether a user is in motion. Its value is 1 if the user is in motion and is 0 otherwise. Before subscribing to this sensor, the application needs to request the ohos.permission.ACTIVITY_MOTION permission.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • CategoryMotion

        public CategoryMotion​(int sensorId,
                      String name,
                      String vendor,
                      int version,
                      float upperRange,
                      float resolution,
                      int flags,
                      int cacheMaxCount,
                      long minInterval,
                      long maxInterval)
        A constructor used to create a CategoryMotion instance.
        Parameters:
        sensorId - Indicates the ID of the sensor.
        name - Indicates the name of the sensor.
        vendor - Indicates the manufacturer of the sensor.
        version - Indicates the version of the sensor.
        upperRange - Indicates the maximum measurement range of the sensor.
        resolution - Indicates the resolution of the sensor.
        flags - Indicates the flags of the sensor.
        cacheMaxCount - Indicates the maximum number of hardware FIFO elements supported by the sensor.
        minInterval - Indicates the minimum sampling interval of the sensor, in nanoseconds.
        maxInterval - Indicates the maximum sampling interval of the sensor, in nanoseconds.
        Since:
        1
